description: Standard table definitions for bridge protocols, including pool-based, mint-based, and intent-based bridges.

tables.label: Tokens
tables.description: List of tokens in bridge protocols.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token.

token_decimals.description: The decimal amount of the token.

chain_id.description: The blockchain ID where the token resides.

tables.label: Pools
tables.description: List of pools in bridge protocols (applicable for pool and mint based bridges).

timestamp.description: The timestamp this pool was created.

creation_block_number.description: The block number this pool was created on.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token being bridged or pooled.

token_index.description: (Optional, only applicable to pool-based) The index of the pooled token in the smart contract.

fee_rate.description: The fee rate as a percentage for the pool, if applicable (ie, 2.3% fee as 0.023).

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

chain_id.description: Standard chain ID (ie, the chain ID of the network the pool lives on).

bridge_type.description: The type of bridge (ie, pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

tables.label: LP Snapshot
tables.description: List of liquidity providers in pool-based bridge protocols.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

lp_address.description: The address of the liquidity provider.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token supplied.

token_index.description: The index in the smart contract of this token, default to 0.

token_amount.description: The amount of the supplied token, decimal normalized.

chain_id.description: The standard chain ID where the liquidity provider resides.

bridge_type.description: The type of bridge (pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

tables.label: User Snapshot
tables.description: User level snapshot of accounts that have used the bridge (applicable to pool and intent based bridges).

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

pool_address.description: (Optional, only applicable to pool-based) The contract address of the pool.

user_address.description: The address of the user this snapshot activity is based on.

amount_in_usd.description: The amount of tokens received on this network by the user in USD during the given snapshot.

amount_out_usd.description: The amount of tokens sent out of this network by the user in USD during the given snapshot.

chain_id.description: The standard chain ID where the bridger resides.

bridge_type.description: The type of bridge (pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

tables.label: Pool Snapshot
tables.description: Pool level snapshots for pool and mint based bridges.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token being bridged or pooled.

token_index.description: (Optional, only applicable to pool-based) The index of the pooled token in the smart contract.

token_amount.description: The amount of the supplied token (in a pool-based bridge), decimal normalized.

volume_usd.description: The bridged volume in USD, during this snapshot.

fees_usd.description: The fees collected in USD, during the snapshot period.

chain_id.description: The standard chain ID where the pool resides.

bridge_type.description: The type of bridge (pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

block_number.description: The block number of the transaction.

transaction_hash.description: The hash of the transaction this bridge originated from.

log_index.description: The log index of the transaction.

user_address.description: The address of the user initiating the transaction.

token_address.description: The smart contract address of the source chain bridge token.

token_amount.description: The amount of the token sent out from the source chain, decimal normalized.

solver_address.description: The address of the solver (for intent-based bridges).

pool_address.description: The address of the pool (for pool-based and mint-based bridges).

bridge_type.description: The type of bridge (pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

tables.label: Maker Snapshot
tables.description: List of makers in intent-based bridge protocols.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

token_address.description: The smart contract address of the token being supplied by the maker.

token_in_amount.description: The amount of the token received, decimal normalized.

amount_in_usd.description: The amount received in USD, during this snapshot.

token_out_amount.description: The amount of the token sent out, decimal normalized.

amount_out_usd.description: The amount sent in USD, during this given snapshot.

fees_usd.description: The fees collected in USD, during this snapshot.

chain_id.description: The standard chain ID where the maker resides.

tables.label: Taker Snapshot
tables.description: List of takers in intent-based bridge protocols.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

token_address.description: The smart contract address of the token.

volume_amount.description: The amount of volume bridged from the source chain, decimal normalized.

volume_usd.description: The volume bridged in USD, in the given snapshot.

chain_id.description: The standard chain ID where the taker resides.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

token_address.description: he contract address of the token.

token_amount.description: The amount of the token held in the pool, decimal normalized (for pool-based bridges).

volume_amount.description: The amount of volume bridged of the token, decimal normalized.

volume_usd.description: The volume in USD, during the given period.

total_fees_usd.description: The fees collected in USD, during this given period.

chain_id.description: The standard chain ID where the token resides.

tables.label: Incentive Claim Data
tables.description: Transactional data on user level incentives claimed data.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

transaction_signer.description: The address of the account that signed the transaction.

user_address.description: The address of the user who claimed the incentives (could be different from the transaction_signer).

claimed_token_address.description: The smart contract address of the claimed token.

amount.description: The amount of the token claimed, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of claimed tokens in USD.

other_incentive_usd.description: (Optional) Any incentives outside of the claimed token, in this transaction, summed up in USD terms.
